  • Enclosing class:
    offline_mode_service

        Parameters:

        map - the hashmap of what we want to add (the types)
        table - the table that we work with
        vector - the data

            pushes update command

        Parameters:
        db - the database to work with
        type - the data types (if needed to stringify)
        table - the table name
        compare_to - what to compare the data to to identifiy target
        update_to - what should we update the data to
        where_clause - what field should we compare
        Returns:
        the stringified form of the SQL request
